title: MNF Preview: Patriots vs. Chiefs, Falcons vs. Packers Gambling Picks, Props & DFS Advice (Football 10/5)
description:
Through some unfortunate circumstances, we are now given two Week 4 Monday Night Football games as Will Brinson is joined by Tyler to break down both the normally slotted Falcons-Packers matchup plus the newly added Patriots-Chiefs showdown. The guys cover everything you need to know from a gambling perspective including game picks, props to target and how to craft your DFS lineups for the night. How different will New England's offense look with Brian Hoyer running things? Will Packers injuries deter from Aaron Rodgers early MVP campaign? Listen to get you ready for a busy Monday night!
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @TylerSully
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
